overview: Some girls prostitute themselves under a highway bridge, a tropical forest on the outskirts of the city, and a strange reunion between a mother and her son, who seems to love his mom a little too much. 'All the love of the world' is like a vivid, brutal and disturbing daydream, immersed in 'Yes sir, I can boogie', the cult song of Baccara.
title: All the Love of the World
